TEXT.S:
= Sengan = Gaga mniq Yilan Tatungsyang ka alang Sengan. 30 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 93 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 91% niqan 85 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 9% niqan 8 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Tayal86%, Amis1%, ni rahuq na o4%.
Hangan alang Alang nyo-tu.
Thuyang alang Smdhaan Tanah Tunux siida.
Nniqan alang I-ran-seyn Ta-tung-syang Fu-sin-cun.
Klbangan Mniq narac yayug Ran-yang, quri hunac hragan hidaw yaa bi 300 ni 400km.
Kndkilan lnglingay hdrus.
Kklaan ppanan Mgriq rulu. Tg1 elug Rwo-tung-cn>tay 7 ping>hakaw cing-siwi.
Mlutuc syusan teync Nniqan seejiq alang Skari kari Snhiyaan Pnyahan alang Kklaan rrigaw
